basics.name: Kumar Sambhav Jain
basics.label: Principal Sofware Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced and innovative software backend engineer with over 12 years of hands-on expertise in developing robust, scalable, and high-performance backend solutions. Proficient in a wide array of programming languages and technologies, including Java, Spring Boot and Apache Spark, Postgres, MySQL and Kafka. Skilled in containerization technologies like Kubernetes and Docker, with a strong understanding of cloud platforms including AWS and Azure. Adept at leveraging Apache Kafka for building real-time streaming data pipelines and event-driven architectures. I have proven track record of leading successful project implementations from concept to deployment, while adhering to strict timelines and code and documentation quality standards. Highly collaborative, with a demonstrated ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams to drive innovation and achieve business objectives. Seeking to leverage my extensive experience to contribute significantly to the success of dynamic projects and initiatives within a forward-thinking organization.

highlights: Project : Trade Connect
Skill used : Java, Kafka(Confluent Cloud, Kafka Connect, Kafka Streams), Spring Boot, Azure, CosmosDB for NoSQL
The project caters to one of the biggest asset manager for post trade lifecycle management
Project : UPI
Skill used : Java, Kafka, Spring Boot, MySQL
Transaction Recon system - Scalable  system for doing transaction recon among UPI transaction participants.
Responsible for technical debt and code quality of around 10 codebases.Incorporated code quality gates in CI/CD pipelines. Mentoring team about best practices for writing SOLID code.
Revamped outdated modules in terms of technical debt and modularity - splitting into independent microservices
Project : Bank Reporting System
Skill used : Java, Kafka, Kafka Streams, Kafka Connect, Apache Spark, Spring Boot
Responsible for end to end delivery of critical features related to passbook and statement module
Revamped outdated modules for bulk statement delivery which sends out ~7 million monthly statements
Designing and implementing feature that delivers on-demand account statement and reports from data warehouse to corporate accounts
Data Ingestion pipeline using Kafka Connect, Kafka Streams
Encouraged developers to write SOLID and test friendly code
Knowledge sharing and training session for new joiners and freshers
work.summary: Involved in design and implementation of new features, production deployment.

highlights: Project Name :- Data Delivery
Skills/Tech. Used :- Java 8, Google Guice, MongoDB, Kafka, Zookeeper, Spark, AWS ( ECS,ECR, SNS, ELB, Lambda ), Docker, GitLab, Angular 6, Angular Material
work.summary: An internal project that provides financial data feed to other teams/prject for processing.

highlights: Project Name :- WebInsure Financial Management
Skills/Tech. Used :- Java, Spring(Boot, MVC, Batch, Integration), RabbitMQ, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, AngularJS, Bower, Grunt, Yeoman
Part of core team handling design and development of core features.
Design and code refactoring to achieve better performance.
Modularized front-end code structure and introduced automated build process using Bower & Grunt.
Awarded on-spot awards and monthly performance awards on various occasions.
work.summary: The project provides financial management solution to US Health Insurance market. The software is build upon Micro Service Architecture using Java, Spring, RabbitMQ, SQL, MongoDB, AngularJS. As a team member my responsibilities includes brainstorming about technology stack, taking part in design and development of requirements ensuring quality and unit test friendliness. I have also been assigned proof-of-concept activity during project ramp up and have guided other teams for same.

highlights: Project Name :- JohnDeere
Skills/Tech. Used :- Java, Portlets, jQuery
Developed a utility tool to verfiy configuration properties across various build environment.
Maven-ized project structure to improve modularity and re-usability.
Appraised for my debugging and code refactoring skills.
work.summary: Worked on portal for company's esteem client using Java, Spring and Portlets.

Skills/Tech. Used :- Java, RDBMS, jQuery, HTML, Spring
Involved in implementation of user story using Spring Batch and Integration.
Active player in bug fixing team. Learned code debugging skills
